Text:
Alcoa Corp (AA) shares closed today at 0.6% above its 52 week low of $23.26, giving the company a market cap of $4B. The stock is currently down 46.8% year-to-date, down 40.9% over the past 12 months, and down 38.1% over the past five years. This week, the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 1.6%, and the S&P 500 fell 2.4%.
Trading Activity

Beta, a measure of the stock’s volatility relative to the overall market stands at 1.9.

The Relative Strength Index (RSI) on the stock was under 30, indicating it may be underbought.
MACD, a trend-following momentum indicator, indicates a downward trend.
The stock closed below its Bollinger band, indicating it may be oversold.
